groups.name: variables
groups.visibleRule: command = migrate || command = clean || command = info || command = validate || command = baseline || command = repair  || comamnd = undo || command = check

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: SQL scripts directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flyway SQL scripts directory. If empty, the root of the repository (build) or artifacts (release) is used, which is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: JDBC url
inputs.helpMarkDown: The jdbc url must follow standard format. These formats can be found on Flyway documentation. [Ex for SQL Server](https://flywaydb.org/documentation/database/sqlserver). But first be sure [your database is supported](https://flywaydb.org/documentation/commandline/#jdbc-drivers)

inputs.name: user
inputs.label: Database user
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user to use to connect to the database

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Database password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password to use to connect to the database

inputs.name: commandOptions
inputs.label: Command Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Any additional options for the selected command such as `-input=true`. Multiple options can be provided delimited by spaces as `-option1=value -option2=value -option3=value`
